hints.content:
To find how many centimeters Renn cut, we start with the $\purpleD{\text{original scarf length}}$ and subtract the $\blueE{\text{new scarf length}}$.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/2d6da26a1b9de37ce875ba875fecfcae17006938)  

$\purpleD{36}\text{ cm}-\blueE{19}\text{ cm}=\maroonD{\square}\text{ cm}$

Let's subtract to find the difference.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/7fb2139934f087f0ef4acc50a9a329a75a6dd5c6)

$\purpleD{36}\text{ cm} - \blueE{19}\text{ cm}  = \maroonD{17}\text{ cm}$
Renn cut $\maroonD{17}\text{ cm}$ off of his scarf.

question.content:
Renn has a $36\text{ cm}$ scarf.  He decides to cut off part of the scarf so it is now only $19\text{ cm}$.  

**How many centimeters did Renn cut off of his scarf?**
  
[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] $\text{cm}$
